data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Michalczyk, Łukasz, Diduszko, Dawid (2005): with a description of Macrobiotus garynahi sp. nov. (Eutardigrada: Macrobiotidae: richtersi group). Zootaxa 1053: 35-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170045
